text: Kayi ntumintumi yumonga gwa kumpindi, mgolokera gwa motu, kalawiti pashitalawanda sha kutambikira, kamgambiriti kwa liziwu likulu ntumintumi gwa kumpindi, ntumintumi ulii yakawera na shimagi shikola, “Na gwenga gutuli kala shimagi shaku shikola, guvijojiniri visanya vya mizyabibu ya pasipanu, toziya zyabibu zyakuwi ziwula!”
